2010-11-09

Movember 2010: Favourite moustaches #5 Cab Calloway

During November I'm growing a 'tache to raise money for prostate cancer - come sponsor me over here.

Never, ever get tired of watching Cab do Minnie the Moocher - he was great doing it in the 30s and still great doing it in the 80s... he was great as a man and great as a walrus...
